description: First floor side extension; single and two storey rear extension; raised patio with glass balustrade and steps to rear; alterations to roof; rear dormer; rooflights in front and rear roof slopes; external alterations
decision_conditions: <p><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">Insufficient information has been submitted in relation to impact of the proposed development on the piped watercourse and in relation to the compensatory flood storage.&nbsp; In the absence of such details, the local planning authority cannot be satisfied that the development would secure appropriate mitigation against flooding on site and elsewhere and that the proposed structure would not impact upon the structural integrity of the piped watercourse in terms of structural loading. The proposed development would therefore be contrary to </span>&nbsp;<span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">policy SI 12 (C) of The London Plan (2021) and </span><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">policies DM</span><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">9</span><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif"> and DM1</span><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">1</span><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif"> of the Development Management Policies Local Plan </span><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">(</span><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">2013</span><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">)</span><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif">.</span><br></p>
